
describe-severity-levels
************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

This action returns the list of severity levels that you can assign to
an AWS Support case. The severity level for a case is also a field in
the CaseDetails <http://docs.aws.amazon.com/awssupport/latest/APIRefer
ence/API_CaseDetails.html> `_ data type included in any `create-case
request.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws support describe-severity-levels
     [--language <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--language"  (string)
